publication.authors: Povoa RCBL, Koshiyama AS, Dias DM, Souza PL, Horta BA.
publication.title: Multi-Modal Optimization by Multi-Gene Genetic Programming.
publication.presented: In Proceedings. 2018 IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation (CEC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, 2018.
publication.description: The work presents a preliminary analysis of a new method using multi-gene genetic programming to multi-modal numerical optimization. The new algorithm uses some niching techniques based on the clear procedure to maintain the population diversity, in order to perform a multivariate mapping among initial guesses to optimal parameters for a system. It was used a multi-modal benchmark set with different characteristics and difficulty levels to evaluate this new algorithm. Statistical analysis suggested that this new multi-modal method using multi-gene genetic programming can be used for problems that requires more than a single solution.
